column4: I'm using Windows right now at the library, 'cause I can't get Ubuntu to load at home! :-) Any suggestions for getting into the GRUB menu when ESC or ESC+SHIFT doesn't work?
Do I just do CTRL or CTRL+ESC?
Thanks, Elisboa. I'm pulling my laptop out right now to try it. Praxi, I'm not sure what !grub2 means. I'm a dope.
